sqlMap.statement: SELECT NPAI2210.INTERFACE_ID AS INTERFACE_ID ,NPAI2210.TRANSACTION_ID AS TRANSACTION_ID ,NPAI2210.SEGMENT_ID AS SEGMENT_ID ,NPAI2210.UNIT_ID AS UNIT_ID ,NPAI2210.SEQ_NUMBER AS SEQ_NUMBER ,NPAI2210.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD ,NPAI2210.CVI_INVTY_TP_DESC_TXT AS CVI_INVTY_TP_DESC_TXT ,NPAI2210.CVI_INVTY_QTY AS CVI_INVTY_QTY FROM NPAI2210_01 NPAI2210 WHERE NPAI2210.INTERFACE_ID = #interfaceId# AND NPAI2210.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND NPAI2210.CVI_INVTY_TP_DESC_TXT = #invtyTpDescTxt# AND NPAI2210.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY NPAI2210.SEGMENT_ID ,NPAI2210.UNIT_ID ,NPAI2210.SEQ_NUMBER
